name: Dead by 28 - Attacks CD
description:
2-7-13 - Now available. 15 NEW Songs from Dead by 28. 
A limited number of the Dead by 28 Attacks! CD will be shipped with limited edition "Dead by 28" Attacks! stickers.

It's been nearly 4 years since Dead by 28 released a new Album (Dizman's Inferno - 2007) and nearly 10 years since the band started ( The Spawning - 2003) the Horror Trilogy that concludes with 2012's Attacks! 

Made in Hell EP's (Act's 1,2, and 3) started the story (as The prequal)

The Spawning (Setting the Stage)

Attacks!  (The Conclusion)
---------------------------------------------------------

The "Attacks!" CD will feature the following Songs - 
The Shape of Things to Come, Life, Between Good & Evil, 
(It's a Little) Messed Up, With Closed Eyes, The War, Attack!, 
(The 4th wall) Breakdown, I Can't Quit (My day Job), Until I Die, Sweet Lies <CD Only Exclusive Song>, F*ckFace, The End is Near, Don't Tell Me(What I Can't Do), and The Culling Song.
----------------------------------------------------------
Recorded at the Condemned Studio in Roseville, Michigan. 2007-2011. Dead by 28 are represented by BMI Publishing. Released Digitally , Oct 2011. Black 13 Recordings. 
Features Sissie on Guitar for the Songs "(The 4th wall) Breakdown" and "The Culling Song". Sissie also plays the guitar solo on "With Closed Eyes".

name: Dead by 28 - Dizman's Inferno T-Shirt
description: Double sided print BLACK T-Shirt- Image shows front design of T-Shirt. Back of the T-Shirt reads "I'm Pissed off and No one cares, cuz everybody Hates Me"

name: Dead by 28 - The Spawning
description: Released Oct 30th 2002. Recorded at the Funhouse studio with Legendery Detroit Producer Mike E Clark, for his now defunct B4 Records Lable. Full Length CD. 16 tracks of Musical Madness. Computer Enhancement on CD. Contains the songs: Burn Bitch Burn, A Thing Called Evil, Cold Dark Place, The Collection, Wasted Life, Insanity, Somehow, Goin' On A Trip, Blood Tears and Agony, Suicidal Rantings, Home of Disgrace, and more

name: Dead by 28 - Back Catalog CD's
description:
Dizman's Inferno - Released on Black 13 Recordings in 2008. Recorded at the Condemned Studio in Roseville Mi. This EP is a 7 song companion CD to the "Made in Hell" Trilogy. 7 Deadly Songs. On Dizman's Inferno Dead by 28 explores the depths of hell and the 7 deadly sins within. 

Other CD's Also available: The Spawning (2002 Produced by Mike E Clark ), Ressur-wrecked EP CD (2003 - Produced by Mike E Clark), Beating a Dead Whore (split single - produced by Mike E Clark - 2004), Made in Hell Act 1 EP (2005), Made in Hell Act 2 EP (2006-2nd PRESSING), Made in Hell Act 3 EP CD (2006), and Dizman's Inferno (2007). 
All back catalog CD's are available for only $8.00 for a limited time.

name: Dead by 28 - T-Shirts
description:
Dead by 28 - Funeral Flag XLG T-Shirt
Printed on both sides of a Black t-shirt. The Funeral Flag design of Dead by 28 T-Shirt will be available for only $13.00 plus shipping. Front of shirt features the logo in the picture, the back of the shirt is also printed on  and says "I'd Rather be Dead".
X-large size only. Limited Time Offer

all other t-shirts are available for only $13.00

We Also have a limited number of the Burn Bitch Burn T-Shirt and  Ressurection Into Darkness T-Shirt. Please e-mail dx28booking@hotmail.com for available sizes. Then you can purchase any Dead by 28 T-Shirt at this price.
